languages.text: {n}Рой сервочерепов издает громкую бинарную трель и самый крупный из них в мгновение ока впивается в бок конструкции механическим буром. Мучительный скрежет возвещает, что воля Машинного духа сломлена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Рой сервочерепов издает громкую бинарную трель и самый крупный из них в мгновение ока впивается в бок конструкции механическим буром. Мучительный скрежет возвещает, что воля Машинного духа сломлена.{/n}
traits.speaker: Master_ServoskullSwarm_PetUnit

languages.text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рой сервочерепов издает громкую бинарную трель и самый крупный из них в мгновение ока впивается в бок конструкции механическим буром. Мучительный скрежет возвещает, что воля Машинного духа сломлена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

{n}A loud binary trill from one of your servo-skulls interrupts the conversation. Its buzzing mechanical bore drills into the side of the cogitator frame and switches something inside it. A moment later, you hear a loud click as a secret door opens somewhere amid the ice blocks.{/n}

{n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

{n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

{n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

{n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

{n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servoschädel-Schwarm stößt einige binhärische Signale aus und der größte der Schädel treibt sofort seinen mechanischen Bohrer in die Seite der Struktur. Ein schmerzerfülltes Kreischen begleitet das Brechen des Willens des Maschinengeistes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servoschädel-Schwarm stößt einige binhärische Signale aus und der größte der Schädel treibt sofort seinen mechanischen Bohrer in die Seite der Struktur. Ein schmerzerfülltes Kreischen begleitet das Brechen des Willens des Maschinengeistes.{/n}

{n}Ein lautes binhärisches Trillern von einem deiner Servoschädel unterbricht das Gespräch. Sein summender mechanischer Bohrer gräbt sich in die Seite des Cogitator-Gehäuses und aktiviert etwas im Inneren. Einen Augenblick später hörst du ein lautes Klicken, als sich irgendwo in den Eisblöcken eine Geheimtür öffnet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'essaim de servocrânes émet un chapelet de signaux binhaires, et le crâne le plus imposant se met immédiatement à percer l'une des faces de la structure à l'aide de son foret mécanique. Le crissement strident qui en résulte annonce la disparition de l'esprit de la machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'essaim de servocrânes émet un chapelet de signaux binhaires, et le crâne le plus imposant se met immédiatement à percer l'une des faces de la structure à l'aide de son foret mécanique. Le crissement strident qui en résulte annonce la disparition de l'esprit de la machine.{/n}

{n}La conversation est interrompue par un bruyant trille binhaire émanant de l'un de vos servocrânes. Son foret mécanique vrombissant perce la paroi latérale du cogitateur et active quelque chose à l'intérieur. Un instant plus tard, un cliquetis vous indique qu'une porte dérobée s'est ouverte quelque part parmi les blocs de glace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伺服头骨集群发出了一连串二进制信号，最大的那颗伺服头骨伸出了机械钻头，钻入了沉思者外壳侧面。随后，沉思者发出了痛苦的尖叫声，机魂的意志被制服了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨集群发出了一连串二进制信号，最大的那颗伺服头骨伸出了机械钻头，钻入了沉思者外壳侧面。随后，沉思者发出了痛苦的尖叫声，机魂的意志被制服了。{/n}
{n}其中一颗伺服头骨发出了响亮的二进制语颤音，打断了谈话。它的机械钻头嗡嗡作响，刺入了沉思者外壳侧面，激活了里面的机构。过了一会儿，你听到了一声响亮的“咔哒”声，冰块中间某处的秘门打开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El enjambre de servocráneos suelta una retahíla de señales binarias y el mayor de los cráneos clava su taladro en el lateral de la estructura. Un doloroso chirrido acompaña el sometimiento del espíritu máquina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El enjambre de servocráneos suelta una retahíla de señales binarias y el mayor de los cráneos clava su taladro en el lateral de la estructura. Un doloroso chirrido acompaña el sometimiento del espíritu máquina.{/n}

{n}El sonoro gorjeo binario de uno de tus servocráneos interrumpe la conversación. Su taladro mecánico zumba y atraviesa el lateral del cogitador, activando algo en su interior. Un momento después, oyes un fuerte chasquido y una puerta secreta se abre entre los bloques de hielo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴォスカル・スウォームは一連のバイナリック信号を発し、最も大きなスカルが即座に機械式ドリルを構造物の側面を穿った。痛ましい悲鳴が、機械精霊の意志の崩壊を告げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴォスカル・スウォームは一連のバイナリック信号を発し、最も大きなスカルが即座に機械式ドリルを構造物の側面を穿った。痛ましい悲鳴が、機械精霊の意志の崩壊を告げた。{/n}
{n}サーヴォスカルの一つから大きなバイナリックの音が響いて、会話を妨げた。機械式ドリルが考算機のフレームに穴を開けて内部の何かを起動した。少し後に、カチッと大きな音がして、氷のブロックに隠されていた扉が開いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmelet sürüsü, bir dizi ikilidil sinyal veriyor ve en büyük kafatası, mekanik matkabını yapının yan tarafına saplıyor. Acı dolu bir çığlık, makine ruhunun iradesinin kırıldığını müjdeliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skull swarm lets out a string of binharic signals, and the largest of the skulls instantly digs its mechanical drill into the side of the structure. A painful screech heralds the breaking of the machine spirit's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmelet sürüsü, bir dizi ikilidil sinyal veriyor ve en büyük kafatası, mekanik matkabını yapının yan tarafına saplıyor. Acı dolu bir çığlık, makine ruhunun iradesinin kırıldığını müjdeliyor.{/n}

{n}Hizmeletlerinden biri, gür bir ikilidil nağmeyle konuşmayı keser. Vızıldayan mekanik matkabı, kavramsayar kasasının yanını delip içerdeki bir şeyi etkinleştirir. Ardından tok bir tık sesi işitirsin ve buz kütleleri arasında saklı bir kapı aralanır.{/n}
